column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=When you need to go outside the city limits of London , it is best to take a train .
#id=2
#text=Cars are a poor choice as they hit traffic often , as well as cost money to drive , for me it is far cheaper to take the train .
#id=3
#text=This , of course , was when I lived in London which I do not do now .
#id=4
#text=Anyway , when I wanted to visit the beach town of Brighton I took the train .
#id=5
#text=I made sure to research the time schedule as to find the correct train and time .
#id=6
#text=I found there was one going when I wanted and it was leaving from Victoria station .
#id=7
#text=I made sure to get there early so as to purchase a ticket and get a good seat , I do n't like traveling backwards .
#id=8
#text=Having bought my ticket at the counter I walked to the waiting train .
#id=9
#text=It was very nice and new and I had little trouble finding a good seat .
#text=I settled in and closed my eyes , ready to rest on the exceedingly comfortable train that was taking me on an adventure .
